nodes.text: The Second Pius Dea Crusade was one of several religious crusades orchestrated by the Pius Dea religious cult, which controlled the Galactic Republic through the Contispex dynasty of Supreme Chancellors. Sometime after the First Pius Dea Crusade in 11,965 BBY, the Pius Dea initiated the second crusade by moving against Hutt Space, playing on Republic citizens' fear of the Hutts. The crusade ended sometime before 11,939 BBY, when Chancellor Contispex II initiated the Third Pius Dea Crusade against the Hutts.

The Second Pius Dea Crusade was indirectly mentioned in The Essential Guide to Warfare, a 2012 reference book. The First and Third Crusades are depicted on a map of several of the Pius Dea Crusades, and the guide also states that the first several crusades were against the Hutts.
